name: Maze of Stinkiness
description: Make your way through 2 levels of the maze while being chased by 5 burgers holding pizza swords. There is also a big burger slowly chasing you down, don't worry about him though, he is really nice. To complete the first level you must collect a can of deodorant hidden in the maze. For the second level it is a green cocktail you need to find and pick up.
